definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: grating or lattice-work, cstr. [[מִכְבַּר]];—Ex 27:4 and thou shalt make for it (the altar of burnt-offering in the tab.) [[מִכְבָּר מַעֲשֵׂה]] [[רֶשֶׁת נְהשֶׁת]] a grating, (even) a network of bronze, which surrounded the lower half of the altar (v:Ex 27:5 b): so Ex 38:4; [[מִכְבַּר הַנְּחשֶׁת]] Ex 35:16, Ex 38:5, Ex 38:30, Ex 39:39.
